categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Fixer 66 was the codename of a Human male who held the rank of Fixer in Imperial Intelligence during the Cold War. Stationed on the planet Balmorra, he monitored resistance communications in the Markaran Plains, and developed a plan to booby-trap comm devices so that they would explode at the resistance's bases when salvaged from corpses. He recruited the technical expert known as Toybox to carry out the plan.
